snippet.title: NEXTDC to acquire Asia Pacific Data
snippet.content: NEXTDC will make an unconditional all cash off-market takeover offer to acquire all the securities of Asia Pacific Data Centre Group (APDC). The offer price is $1.87 cash per security. APDC securityholders will also be entitled to receive the $0.0243 per security distribution announced on June 26, 2017. Originally published as
